meanings.sent1: The commonalty gathered in the town square to hear the mayor speak.
meanings.sent2: The commonalty enjoyed the outdoor concert in the park.
meanings.sent3: The commonalty decided to have a picnic in the park, but it started raining!
meanings.sent4: In the sea of faces, she searched for a familiar commonalty.
meanings.sent5: The commonalty cheered as the team scored the winning goal.

meanings.definition: The common features or characteristics shared by a group of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The commonalty between the two paintings was their vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The commonalty among the students was their love for learning.
meanings.sent3: The commonalty of interests brought the group together for a fun game night.
meanings.sent4: The commonalty in their personalities made them instant friends.
meanings.sent5: The commonalty in their taste in music led to many lively discussions.
